user-story.i-want: to plug the feed into the LightFM recommendation service
user-story.so-that: viewers receive relevant videos that keep them engaged.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Serverpod `recommendation_bridge_service.dart` proxies requests to LightFM API v2025.9 with gRPC deadline 150 ms and retries capped at 2. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#implementation-guide]

Recommendation fallback logic switches to trending feed when LightFM errors or exceeds deadline, logging Datadog event `feed.recommendation.fallback`. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#implementation-guide]

Interaction endpoint streams events to Kafka topic `feed.interactions.v1` with schema `{userId, videoId, interactionType, watchTime, timestamp}`. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#source-tree--file-directives]

**DATA QUALITY CRITICAL**: Segment analytics emits `feed_recommendation_served` event containing algorithm, feed session, and experiment variant IDs. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#analytics--observability]
Nightly retraining job triggers via Serverpod task, pulling parquet exports of interactions and logging completion status to Snowflake. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#recommendation-engine]

task.description: Implement `recommendation_bridge_service.dart` with gRPC client, circuit breaker, and metrics.
Update `feed_service.dart` to request recommendations with personalization filters, fallback to trending when necessary.
Modify `interaction_endpoint.dart` to enqueue Kafka messages and persist to `user_interactions`.
Provision Kafka topic `feed.interactions.v1` and IAM role `feed-rec-producer`.
Schedule Serverpod cron job `feed_lightfm_retrain` nightly at 02:00 UTC, publishing metrics to Datadog.
Add analytics instrumentation for recommendation served/consumed events with experiment IDs.
Update `record_interaction_use_case.dart` to include session + recommendation metadata in payload.
